author: gstein
msg: Slight optimization: open the PDH that we found, then use the opened
(parse_local_abspath): call ensure_sdb_opened before we grab the wcroot

author: gstein
msg: Various improvements to the wc_db code.
(scan_upwards_for_repos): replace WC_ID and SDB parameters with a single
parse_local_abspath, as a tight encapsulation of this functionality
(get_statement_for_path): switch STMT_IDX type to an enum
(gather_children): rename parameter to STMT_IDX to align with
get_statement_for_path. use that func to eliminate a bunch of code.
change initial array size to 10 based on review of svn's trunk.
(svn_wc__db_close): tweak to store wcroots rather than SDBs.
